overview:
BigSun Technologies Pvt Ltd is an Indian multinational corporation headquartered in Navi Mumbai, India. We build products That Provide the right impetus for growth. We offer industry-specific applications engineered for speed, using ground breaking technology delivering rich user experience and flexible deployment options.

Our Vision is to be RECOGNIZED as an innovative software product company. Our Mission is to create new and innovative software products That address unique needs of the Customers Developing and adopting new technologies while adhering to Highest standards of customer service, employee capability and ethics.

Core Values

Customers: We will Endeavour to meet explicit and latest needs of the Customers Developing new products supported by strong service. We will build a strong brand for our products through technology, service and our unique approach to engaging with Customers.

Employees: Employees are our vital assets to meet our vision. We will build a culture of openness and customer centricity. We will Enhancing Constantly invest in our employees’ knowledge base so That They Deliver on Their performances. We will seek to build an organization of high integrity and discipline. Vendors and Partners: We will seek to build a long term relationship with our partners and vendors through meeting Commitments, Ethical and fair dealings.

Investors: We will build a profitable product company That adheres to best standards of corporate governance while Constantly working towards lower leverage of capital towards debt. The owners will REMAIN committed to the company through a Meaningful roles That They Would play at all times.
